events.message: Applicant has submitted the personal loan application to cover medical expenses and consolidate existing debt.
Loan application has been categorised under Personal Loan based on keywords such as medical and debt consolidation.
A loan officer specializing in personal loans has been assigned to handle this applicant's case moving forward.
Initial documentation review shows the applicant meets basic eligibility requirements for a personal loan.
Request sent to applicant for recent bank statements, proof of income, and medical bills for verification.
Applicant has submitted all requested documents, including income proof and medical expense receipts.
Credit check performed showing acceptable credit score and debt-to-income ratio within benchmark.
Risk evaluation completed with moderate risk rating due to recent medical debt but overall stable finances.
Personal loan offer presented with competitive interest rate and repayment term suitable to applicant.
Applicant requested clarification on repayment schedule and asked for a slight increase in loan amount.
Application escalated to senior loan officer for assessment of applicant’s request for loan amount adjustment.
Loan approved following review with updated terms reflecting applicant’s requested loan amount increase.
Approved loan amount has been successfully disbursed to the applicant’s designated bank account.
Follow-up conducted to ensure applicant received loan funds and understands repayment obligations clearly.
Personal loan application case closed successfully after all disbursement and initial follow-up activities completed.
